project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic (Celsius to Fahrenheit, Fahrenheit to Celsius, Celsius to Kelvin, Kelvin to Celsius, Fahrenheit to Kelvin, Kelvin to Fahrenheit)
Create command-line interface to accept user input for temperature and output unit
Write tests for each implemented conversion function
Execute tests to ensure all conversion functions work correctly
